Pre-Game Insights: The Warriors are 13-12 against Western Conference opponents.
The Grizzlies are 10-9 in conference play.
The Warriors are shooting 44.8% from the field this season, 0.4 percentage points higher than the 44.4% the Grizzlies allow to opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies average 12.9 offensive rebounds per game led by Zach Edey averaging 3.7.
The Grizzlies average 14.3 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.1 more made shots on average than the 13.2 per game the Warriors give up.
Others: Stephen Curry is shooting 44.7% and averaging 22.3 points for the Warriors.
Santi Aldama is averaging 13 points and 7.3 rebounds for the Grizzlies.
